item.title: Debugging Bash on Windows
item.description: I wrote this on an airplane bach from HQ! I got a lot of practice presenting, had fun with our team mates from Austin TX, and saw how we were underutilizing docker and a few other devops tools. Debugging Bash on Windows Using the WSL and vscode to debug bash scripts on windows bash (in this case the windows subsystem for linux), visual studio code, docker these are a few of my favorite things!
